yaml:
apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolume
metadata:
  name: dockerfile
  labels: {
    "k8s-app": "dockerfile"
  }
spec:
  capacity:
    storage: 1Gi
  claimRef:
    kind: PersistentVolumeClaim
    name: dockerfile-claim
    namespace: default
  volumeMode: Filesystem
  accessModes:
    - ReadWriteOnce
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Retain
  storageClassName: "storage-local"
  hostPath:
    path: /kaniko
    type: ""
